channel.title: Comments on: Out of Focus Much Too Bright
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Pombroll
item.dc:creator: Pombroll
item.description: You guys have given me an excellent excuse for not writing my Memoir: I hate to revisit the life that only my mother would have been interested in.
item.content:encoded: You guys have given me an excellent excuse for not writing my Memoir: I hate to revisit the life that only my mother would have been interested in.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Maybe I can trick myself with a change of environment. Writing on my iPad somewhere outside of the office feels like a different activity. Maybe if I took the laptop to a coffee house or something.
item.content:encoded: Maybe I can trick myself with a change of environment. Writing on my iPad somewhere outside of the office feels like a different activity. Maybe if I took the laptop to a coffee house or something.

item.title: By: Ryan Houlette
item.dc:creator: Ryan Houlette
item.description: This is why I mulishly stuck with my hardware digital audio workstation for so long -- I didn't want to come home from a day at the computer to sit in front of the computer for my hobby.
item.content:encoded: This is why I mulishly stuck with my hardware digital audio workstation for so long — I didn’t want to come home from a day at the computer to sit in front of the computer for my hobby.
